bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted front triangle with ORE DT, geometry designed for 100mm travel, reinforced disc mount, externally machined HT, forged drop outs with eyelets and 06 replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RockShox Tora 318 SL, coil spring,100mm, 32mm Cr-Mo stanchions, alloy steerer, motion control damping, preload and rebound adjustment w/ Lock Out
Alloy A-head forged and tig weldeded w/ two bolt clamp
Alloy, 25mm rise, double butted, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree sweep, 640mm width
Avid SD-3, forged arm w/ 1pc pad
Avid SD-3, forged arm w/ 1pc pad
Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, top swing, bottom pull
Truvativ, 68x113mm, Power Spline, sealed cartridge bearing with alloy cups
SUN MACH 4 L7, 26", 32h, black w/machined sidewalls, eyelets
Joy-Tech cassette, polished races and double sealed, 32h
Specialized BG Sport MTB, light weight foam
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
